attributes.action: Stop taxing us Mr Blair as we are sick and tired of it!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fuel tax, Road tax, inheritance tax, tax on gas, tax on electricity, tax on savings which have already been taxed, tax on pensions, Stamp duty on mortgages.
These are all too high and we in Britain just put up with it. WHY??
Something needs to be done.
If everyone in the UK took a stand the government would have to listen, but us brits just take it and let them walk all over us WHY??????
For example- If you go to your local supermarket and get short changed a few pence you would say something.
The government are RIPPING us of 100`s of pounds, yet no one says anything.
WHY not? It`S your money, you have earned it WHY should they have it??
If you are in favour of paying ridiculously high taxes i thank you for reading details of this petition.
If on the other hand you are sick and tired of paying these ridiculous taxes, please sign this petition.
IT IS NO GOOD MOANING ABOUT IT, WE AS A COUNTRY HAVE TO UNITE AND PUT A STOP TO IT.
Thank you for your interest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
